Subjects: Mary of Egypt, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Mary of Egypt in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
It ware spedfule quha sa cutheto put i wryt ore tel be
                    movthe…
CULGg26.Last Lines: …& at It sa ma besay we Amen parcheryte
